808cargo — логистическая компания, заним: 808cargo is a logistics company engaged in shipping from Shenzhen, the world capital of electronics, to any part of Russia. In addition to all types of logistics, we organize consultations on cargo matters and solve problems with contractors. Currently, we have more than 12 years of experience. Our portfolio includes cooperation with both small enterprises and large retailers. We expedite cargo at all stages, from loading in China to discharging at the customer's site.
Отдельно отметим наш опыт работы с элект: We would like to emphasize our experience in handling electronics and household appliances. Our specialists in China have technical qualifications, allowing them to recognize defects at the receipt stage, protecting you from overpaying for low-quality merchandise.
